divs: Sighting DetailsMufon, you guys know UFO's are real...Why don't you do more to get the word out. Do the government fund Mufon or something? Because all of the proof is in, but some people are still being con by the government. I saw 3 ufos in my life, and it scared the hell out of me....so, if ufos are not real why do the government threaten people.....and tell their own people you didn't see anything?
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
